settings.postRewardThresholdHelp:
Write the minimum post count to reward an user with a medal.

Each users can earn 3 reward based on a post count, if you set for example "50", the internal multiplier (x1, x3, x8) will assign the reward for "50", "150" and "400" posts (bronze, silver and gold respectively).
settings.discussionRewardThresholdHelp:
Write the minimum discussion count to reward an user with a medal.

Each users can earn 3 reward based on a discussion count, if you set for example "50", the internal multiplier (x1, x3, x8) will assign the reward for "50", "150" and "400" discussions (bronze, silver and gold respectively).
settings.seniorityRewardThresholdHelp:
Write the minimum years of seniority to reward an user with a medal.

Each users can earn 3 reward based on a his seniority, if you set for example "1", the internal multiplier (x1, x3, x5) will assign the reward for "1", "3" and "5" years of seniority (bronze, silver and gold level respectively).

forum.firstLoginModalContent:
This forum use a dynamic reputation system to encourage positive engagement within the community. As a user, you can earn reputation points by contributing meaningfully to discussions and interactions, such as:

  • Creating new discussions: Share your thoughts and ideas with the community.
  • Replying to posts: Earn points based on the quality of your responses.
  • Reporting users: Help maintain a healthy environment by reporting inappropriate behavior.
  • Receiving likes: Show appreciation to others' posts and get rewarded in return.
  • Writing best answers: earn points by contributing answers that solve a problem and are chosen as the "best answer"

Earn reputation points by acting positively, helping others, and contributing to the community. Your actions speak louder, and with each point, you gain recognition for your efforts. Keep engaging and build your reputation!
